content:
Yes, here are some advanced yoga poses that target the lower back muscles:

1. Natarajasana (Dancer Pose)
2. Ustrasana (Camel Pose)
3. Dhanurasana (Bow Pose)
4. Urdhva Mukha Svanasana (Upward Facing Dog Pose)
5. Pincha Mayurasana (Feathered Peacock Pose)
6. Salabhasana (Locust Pose)
7. Setu Bandha Sarvangasana (Bridge Pose)
8. Eka Pada Rajakapotasana (One-Legged King Pigeon Pose)
9. Urdhva Dhanurasana (Wheel Pose)
10. Ardha Chandrasana (Half Moon Pose)

However, please note that these poses are advanced and should only be attempted under the guidance of a qualified yoga teacher. It is important to listen to your body and not push beyond your limits.
